title: Use of state or federal examinations
context: ยง412:11-103 Use of state or federal examinations. The commissioner may accept, adopt, or use in lieu of an examination prescribed by section 412:11-102 or otherwise, all or any part of the results of an examination conducted by an appropriate state or federal regulatory agency of a financial institution or a financial institution holding company for the same period or subject matter that would be covered by an examination required or permitted under this article. [L 1993, c 350, pt of ยง1; am L 2006, c 228, ยง44]
